sentence: The image is a screenshot of an Android device screen displaying an app interface for a "Car Mods" application related to Minecraft Pocket Edition (MCPE).
sentence_cn: 该图是 Android 设备屏幕的截图，显示了与 Minecraft Pocket Edition（MCPE）相关的“Car Mods”应用程序的应用界面。

sentence: - The top section displays a magenta header with the app's logo on the left and the title "Car Mods" beside it.
sentence_cn: - 顶部显示一个洋红色的标题，左侧是应用程序的徽标，旁边是标题“Car Mods”。

sentence: Icons for "like" and "favorite" (a thumbs up and a heart) are on the right side of the header.
sentence_cn: “喜欢”和“收藏”的图标（竖起大拇指和心形）位于标题的右侧。

sentence: - Below the header, there's a partial background image showing the Minecraft environment with a character holding an item, possibly an in-game vehicle.
sentence_cn: - 在标题下方，有部分背景图像展示了 Minecraft 环境，其中的角色手持一件物品，可能是游戏中的车辆。

sentence: - The text below the image starts with "Cars Mod" in bold, followed by a description of the mod, mentioning an advanced car system and custom car models.
sentence_cn: - 图像下方的文字以粗体“Cars Mod”开头，后面是该模组的描述，其中提到了先进的汽车系统和定制的汽车模型。

sentence: - At the bottom, there's an Android prompt asking the user whether to "Open with Browser," with the options "JUST ONCE" and "ALWAYS" visible.
sentence_cn: - 在底部，有一个 Android 提示询问用户是否“使用浏览器打开”，并显示“仅一次”和“总是”选项。

sentence: There's also an option to use a different app, which is the "Play Store."
sentence_cn: 您还可以选择使用其他应用程序，即“Play Store”。

sentence: - The top status bar displays various icons, including signals and a battery, with the time shown as 11:06.
sentence_cn: - 顶部状态栏显示各种图标，包括信号和电池，时间显示为 11:06。
